first_translate: I would like to invite you to my tea party this afternoon...

hangle: 온실에서 있을 티 파티에 영애를 초대하고 싶습니다.』
first_translate: ...at our greenhouse.
if your schedule allows for it, please join us,
lady heather aden.
isn’t she...

hangle: 어제 시그렌이랑 일이 있었던 그 영애 아냐?
first_translate: ...the lady that had some trouble with sir siegren yesterday?

hangle: 그런 사람이 여는 티파티에 내가 가도 되는 건가?
first_translate: do I really want to go to her tea party?

hangle: 내가 괜히 신경 쓸 만한 이유는 없지.
first_translate: but there’s no reason why I shouldn’t attend.
she was at fault anyway.

hangle: 어쩌면 티파티에서 유니스를 만날 수 있을지도 모르니까.
first_translate: maybe I’ll get to see eunice again if I do go.
tell her I’m happy to accept her invitation.
good morning, lady eunice.
it's nice seeing you here too, lady fiona!
were you invited as well?
yes, I was.

hangle: 피오나 영애와는 같은 일행임에도 계속 얼굴을 볼 수가 없었네요.
first_translate: even though we’re traveling together, I haven’t seen much of you lately.
that’s because I’ve been riding on horseback.
still, come visit me inside the carriage sometime.
it gets so boring when I'm alone--

hangle: 주변에 온통 기사랑 병사라서 쓸쓸했나 봐.
first_translate: she must have felt lonely since all those guards were around her.
this way, ladies.
the greenhouse is over here.
your hostess awaits you inside.
my goodness! good morning, lady fiona and lady eunice!
my goodness! good morning, lady fiona and lady eunice!
my goodness! good morning, lady fiona and lady eunice!
thank you both for coming today.
I've been waiting for you two.
wow, what a beauty.
no wonder she tried hitting on siegren.
now, please take a seat.
okay, thank you very much.
let me introduce these lovely ladies from nearby territories.

hangle: 명성이 자자한 두 분을 만나서 영광이에요.
first_translate: it’s such an honor meeting you two famous beauties.
oh...
nice meeting you all.
huh? they seem to be staring at me strangely...

hangle: 묘하게 시선이 불온한 것 같은 느낌이….
first_translate: huh? they seem to be staring at me strangely...
I heard you came from the north, lady haillon.
that’s right.
didn’t you find it difficult living up there?

hangle: 거기에는 굉장히 야만적이고 잔혹한 마법사가 산다고 들었는데….
first_translate: I hear there lives a brutal magician in the area...
all places are similar once people start settling down.
wait, how did everyone know about him already?!
speaking of rumors,
I heard...
you don’t share the same bloodline as house haillon.
apparently, you weren’t born into their family.
from what I know,
you’re actually illegitimate.
yes, that’s correct.
I am indeed illegitimate.
how surprising that you knew exactly where I came from.
why is she smiling?
and isn’t it also true that your original family...

hangle: 네. 마약 사업 혐의로 재산을 몰수당했죠.
first_translate: yes, they lost everything after being accused of running illegal drug businesses.
in fact, I reported them myself.
my goodness, I could never bring myself to do something like that.

hangle: 무슨 이유에서든 가족을 자기 손으로 배신하는 건…
first_translate: to betray one’s own family regardless of the circumstances...
only beasts act like that.
j-just hold on now!
lady fiona...
so,
what point are you trying to make?
I just wanted to tell you not to cross any lines!
even if you got lucky enough to become someone else’s adopted daughter,
a noblewoman still needs to maintain certain standards.
therefore,
you need to learn--
siegren.

hangle: 피오나 영애 왜 딴 곳을 보시죠.
first_translate: are you even listening to me, lady fiona?

hangle: 지금 제가 말하고 있는 게 안 보이나요?
first_translate: or are you looking somewhere else?
I still have more things to say.
for instance,

hangle: 남의 저택에서 신세를 지고 있는 와중에 전하께 꼬리를 치셨죠?
first_translate: while you stayed under another person’s roof, didn’t you try seducing his highness?
my maid told me last night--
excuse me.
lady aden, watch your mouth!
what part of what I said wasn’t true?
I merely stated facts...
oops!
aaahh!!
everything you said is absolutely right.

hangle: 전 사생아고, 제가 태어난 가문도 직접 부수었죠.
first_translate: I’m illegitimate, and I destroyed the household I was originally born into.

hangle: 하지만 똑똑한 아덴 영애가 하나 파악하지 못한 게 있네요.
first_translate: but there’s one thing you failed to notice despite being smart, lady aden.
as a result of doing so, I possess power and authority.
as a result of doing so, I possess power and authority.

hangle: 지금 이 자리에서 제가 영애의 머리카락을 불태워도
first_translate: right now, I can burn off every strand of hair on your head,

hangle: 아덴 자작님은 제 아버지께 항의서 몇 장 보내는 게 고작일 거란 뜻이죠.
first_translate: and lord aden will only send a few letters protesting against my actions to my father.

hangle: 망아지처럼 구는 것도 상대를 보면서 하세요.
first_translate: when acting like a foal, consider whom you’re dealing with first.
otherwise, you might lose your neck someday.
and...
p-prince...
prince bernhart...!
looks like you’re having quite a fun time at the tea party,
lady heather aden.
th-that’s because...

hangle: 어제 그런 일이 있었으니 고개를 못 들겠지.
first_translate: of course, you wouldn’t dare look up after what happened yesterday.
let me give you one final piece of advice before leaving.
stop coveting other women’s men.
after all, he belongs to me now.
